name: Erebus
description:
This game is still in development. What is currently playable is a DEMO!

Plot-

You need to make your way to the surface through the underground facility "Phoenix labs.". But be warned, you are not alone. A terrible creature captured for the use of research has escaped, and there seem to be very few survivors. They call it "Erebus" after the Greek god of darkness. Its abilities are beyond this world, but it is quick to anger. The mucus it secrets seems to be able to convert living beings into something else entirely. Don't forget to read your colleagues' notes!

Controls-

W/A/S/D- Move

Shift- Sprint

Ctrl- Crouch

LMB- Shoot

R- Reload

E- Interact

I- Inspect

Please feel free to provide feedback so that I know what needs improvement.
